# Wiki Verification Report

Date: December 17, 2025

## Verification Process

Performed a comprehensive verification of the Remixed Dungeon wiki content:

1. Read the WIKI_DOCUMENTATION.md to understand the wiki system 2. Pulled and analyzed recent changes from the wiki-data submodule 3. Selected and verified random wiki pages against the codebase:

  1. amok_arrow.txt: Verified accuracy of implementation details
  2. sacrificial_sword.txt: Verified accuracy of implementation details
  3. buffs.txt: Verified accuracy of implementation details
  4. range.txt: Verified accuracy of implementation details
  5. spirit_of_pain.txt: Verified accuracy of implementation details

4. Checked all images in wiki pages - no broken image references found 5. Checked backlinks and redlinks - identified 875 red links (mostly in Russian section) 6. Checked for duplicate content - no content duplicates found at higher thresholds 7. Verified naming patterns follow conventions (e.g., _mob, _subclass suffixes)

## Findings

- Wiki content is generally accurate with the codebase - No broken image references found - No content duplicates requiring merging - Naming conventions are followed properly - Some red links exist as expected (for pages that are not yet created)

## Recommendations

- Focus on creating pages for the red links, especially in the English section - Continue following the established naming conventions for new pages - Maintain consistency by referencing source code for accuracy
